name: Square Game
description:
In Square Game, like the original Microsoft Russian Square Plus! Edition you have to proof your ability to create matching lines of blocks before time runs out.

Use the keyboard or mouse to move the active block around and push it into the Square so that all the blocks in a row or column match. When the blocks match , the row or column disappears.



When all blocks are eliminated, you move up to the next level.

The game continues until you surrender, the Square reaches it's maximum size, or you complete all of the levels.
